author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/JP0102-CUSA46747_00-CFCMAE0000000000

A title update will be released on Wednesday, April 16th!

Enjoy newly drawn artwork by CAPCOM artist Shinkiro, new remix tracks by CAPCOM's internal band "CAP-JAMS", and additional features and quality of life enhancements!

Official Website: https://www.capcom-games.com/marvel-vs-capcom-fc/en-us/

This collection spans across multiple titles starting with the first fighting game collaboration, X-MEN CHILDREN OF THE ATOM all the way to the legendary beat 'em up, THE PUNISHER!

All titles support online multiplayer so take this chance to get your hands on these classic games even if you didn't get to experience them at the arcades! 
 
Titles:
・X-MEN CHILDREN OF THE ATOM
・MARVEL SUPER HEROES
・X-MEN VS. STREET FIGHTER
・MARVEL SUPER HEROES vs. STREET FIGHTER
・MARVEL vs. CAPCOM CLASH OF SUPER HEROES
・MARVEL vs. CAPCOM 2 New Age of Heroes
・THE PUNISHER

---------------
■Release Time: Digital and physical vers
title: Marvel vs. Capcom Fighting Collection: Arcade Classics - Title Update Trailer | PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/skull-and-bones/

Hoist your sails, and sharpen your cutlasses—because this year, Skull and Bones goes BIG! Large ships, a new PvP mode, a massive Kraken, a deadly Megafort and more features await throughout Year 2: Faction Wars.
 
Final content for Year 2 is subject to change.

#ps5 #ps5games #skullandbonesgameplay
title: Skull and Bones - Year 2 Announcements Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10008958

Introducing Power Stone and Street Fighter Alpha 3 Upper, included in Capcom Fighting Collection 2!
----------
Power Stone
The sky's the limit in this intuitive 3D fighting game! Chuck objects at enemies, launch spin kicks off pillars, fire off bazookas, throw opponents, and more in this bombastic action title! Collect 3 Power Stones that appear on the stage to transform, and seize victory with a mega-powerful Power Drive attack!

Street Fighter Alpha 3 Upper
The Upper version of the final installment of Street Fighter Alpha 3! Choose your favorite "ism", or fighting style, and get ready to rumble! Play mind games with X-ism, rain down punishing techniques with A-ism, or bamboozle opponents with original V-ism combos—find the style that speaks to you!
----------
 
The fight continues in Capcom Fighting Collection 2, packed with 8 iconic fighting games from across Capcom's history! Get ready to battle on May 16, 2025 on PlayStation
title: Capcom Fighting Collection 2 - Power Stone and Street Fighter Alpha 3 Upper Trailer | PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Out now on PS5: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10004499

Play solo or with up to 4 players. 

Forever Skies is a first-person post-apocalyptic survival game. Return to Earth, ravaged by an ecological disaster. Fly, upgrade and customize your mobile high-tech airship base. Scavenge resources to survive, face dangers on the surface and hunt for viral pathogens to cure a mysterious illness.

#ps5 #ps5games #foreverskies
title: Forever Skies - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011580

The dark saga continues in Skelethrone: The Chronicles of Ericona with The Jewel in the Skull DLC!
Embark on a mysterious adventure where the shadows of the past intertwine with the threats of the present. You will venture into the labyrinth ship of the mad genius Mardek in search of a legendary artifact – “The Jewel in the Skull”

#ps4 #ps4games
title: Skelethrone: The Chronicles of Ericona - The Jewel in the Skull Launch Trailer | PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/fortnite/

"Fortnite's Reload introduces the brand new Slurp Rush map; where fast-paced gameplay is put to the test through the power of healing.

Drop into this Slurp-packed island featuring familiar locations inspired by Chapter 2. Also with this update comes a Rank Reset. Feel the rush and climb through the ranks where you belong!"

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #fortnite
title: Fortnite Reload - Slurp Rush Gameplay Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description: The Access controller is a versatile controller kit that can be customised to meet players’ diverse needs, designed in close collaboration with the accessibility community to help players with disabilities play more comfortably for longer.
title: Shape your adventure with the Access controller for PS5, designed to make gaming more accessible.

author: PlayStation
description:
Annie: Last Hope is Set to Launch on April 24, 2025!

Annie: Last Hope is a ​top-down action shooter with ​HD Voxel-style visuals. Players will embark on an unprecedented adventure featuring ​smooth and exhilarating combat, ​unique bosses, and ​challenging level designs. Dive into a world overrun by ​hordes of zombies, face ​intense boss battles, and unravel a gripping narrative that explores ​a tale of love and betrayal in a post-apocalyptic world, alongside ​moral dilemmas, ​hidden conspiracies, and ​critical choices that will shape your journey.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Annie: Last Hope - Release Date Announce Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
